title: Guides
description: Step-by-step guides for building with our SaaS template

environment.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
environment.description: Learn how to set up Node.js, install dependencies, and configure your local development environment.

database.title: Database Setup and Configuration
database.description: Configure PostgreSQL, set up Drizzle ORM, and create your first database schema.

auth.title: Authentication Implementation
auth.description: Implement secure authentication with NextAuth.js, configure providers, and set up protected routes.

security.title: 🔐 Advanced Security
security.description: Implement advanced security features, rate limiting, and security headers.

analytics.title: 📊 Analytics Integration
analytics.description: Add analytics tracking, custom events, and performance monitoring.

deployment.title: 🚀 Deployment Guide
deployment.description: Deploy your application to production with Vercel, AWS, or other platforms.

components.title: 🔧 Custom Components
components.description: Build reusable UI components and integrate with the design system.
